Gilbert O. Conklin

  1. Foster Name: Gilbert
  2. Foster Family: Charles A. Peterson
  3. Location of Family: Genoa, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Columbus, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 11
  7. Date of Birth: Unknown
  8. Date of Death: 1901-07-10
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: Columbus Telegram, 28 April 1898; Columbus Journal, 12 July 1901.
